name: MacUpdate simplified
css:
@-moz-document domain("macupdate.com") {
  
.js-desktop-nav-item.button,
.js-nav-apps-for-you,
.btn-follow,
.user-discussions-app,
#promo-banner,
.mud-install-headline,
.mud-install-headline__inner,
.carousel-inner,
#simapps-box,
#global-footer,
#appi-dli_mudbox2,
.row.right-col-promo-apps,
#bundle-stickyscroll,
#app-collections-box,
.dfclrb-box-container,
#dfcl-addcollection-banner,
#app_info_desktop,
#rcr_logged_out_container,
#logged_out_tooltip,
#a_leave_review
{ display: none !important; }

#login-modal-header
{ display: none !important; }

.modal-dialog
{ margin-top: 100px !important; }

#top-sim-app-box > div > div > div.yui3-u-1 > div.yui3-u-1-3,
#ad_block_container_right
{ display: none !important; }

.greenbtn.install,
.greenbtn.download
{ display: none !important; }

}
